# reloadAllTimelines()

**Instance Method**

Reloads the timelines for all configured widgets belonging to the containing app.

## Declaration

```swift
func reloadAllTimelines()
```

## Reloading Widget Timelines

- **reloadTimelines(ofKind:)**: Reloads the timelines for all widgets of a particular kind.
